# PageNumberSystemTag.ReplaceOptions property

Gets or sets a value that represents text replace options.

```csharp
public ReplaceTextOptions ReplaceOptions { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

A [`ReplaceTextOptions`](../ReplaceTextOptions.md) instance that contains text options.
